item.title: 在当今的 "勾搭 "文化中，性的竞争环境并不公平，但假装公平却符合男性的利益。路易丝-佩里写道，女性有权愤怒。

item.title: 1/ 2023 年 8 月，我收到一封主题为 "希望能帮助我无家可归的弟弟 "的电子邮件。在接下来的七个月里，我记录了一个家庭为帮助一个男人所做的努力，这个男人离开了他所爱的所有人，追随他脑海中的声音。
item.description:
1/ In August 2023, I received an email with the subject "Hoping to help my homeless brother." I spent the next seven months documenting one family's efforts to help a man who left everyone he loved to follow the voices in his head.https://t.co/M1A9rj61DB https://t.co/M1A9rj61DB

— Julie Wernau (@littlewern) March 24, 2024

item.title: 议长迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）依靠民主党人通过重大立法。如今，众议院的运作更像是一个非正式的联合政府，而不是一个由共和党掌管的议院。
item.description:
Speaker Mike Johnson depends on Democrats to pass major legislation. Today the House is functioning more like an informal coalition government than a GOP-run chamber. https://t.co/prw4mcJbQk https://t.co/prw4mcJbQk

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 马丁-格林菲尔德（Martin Greenfield）于周三去世，他在大屠杀中幸存下来，后来为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）、勒布朗-詹姆斯（LeBron James）和巴拉克-奥巴马（Barack Obama）设计服装。他是美国制造业为何重要的非官方发言人。
item.description:
Martin Greenfield, who died Wednesday, survived the Holocaust and went on to dress Donald Trump, LeBron James and Barack Obama. He was an unofficial spokesman for why American manufacturing matters. https://t.co/xFx3Uvfz7v https://t.co/xFx3Uvfz7v

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 街谈巷议：金融业试图通过 ESG 同时满足官员、道德任务和主题投资者的需求。@jonsindreu 认为，金融业试图同时满足官员、道德任务和主题投资者的需求，但最终却没有为他们中的任何一方提供良好的服务。
item.description:
Heard on the Street: With ESG, the financial industry tried to cater to officials, ethical mandates and thematic investors all at once. It has ended up serving none of them well, argues @jonsindreu. https://t.co/oN8CiMK6Ur https://t.co/oN8CiMK6Ur

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 中国对这个曾经充满活力的城市的控制日益加强，香港社会的任何角落都无法幸免。"当潜规则、不成文的规定越来越多时，人们感到迷茫，只能眼睁睁地看着，默默地接受"。
item.description:
No corner of Hong Kong’s society has been left untouched by China’s tightening grip on the once-vibrant city. “When there are more and more unspoken, unwritten rules, people feel lost and can only watch and silently accept.” https://t.co/xgiMrXGjpU https://t.co/xgiMrXGjpU

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: Kaia Gerber 深知作为 nepo 宝宝的好处。"她说："我个人非常清楚这对我的好处，我绝不会说任何负面的话。
item.description:
Kaia Gerber is aware of the benefits of being a nepo baby. “I personally am very aware of all the wonderful things it has done for me, and I would never ever say anything negative about it,” she says. https://t.co/hiGkgafZuH https://t.co/hiGkgafZuH
